title: PM stresses rising above politics to provide relief to people
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 22 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday stressed the need for all political parties to work together to resolve problems facing the country.
In a meeting with Muttahid Qaumi Movement (MQM) Pakistan Convener Dr Khalid Maqbool Siddiqui, he said it was need of the hour to go beyond political interests and provide relief to the people.
Overall political situation of the country was discussed in the meeting.
Dr Khalid Maqbool Siddiqui assured the prime Minister of MQMâ€™s full support in this regard.
